game.title: Horribunnies
game.description: Horribunnies is a bunny-raising game where the player gets to feed, clean and pet their bunnies. However, this care is not misplaced : the player has to carry out orders for customers who want to adopt bunnies. The player can part ways with bunnies matching specific criteria -such as their color or length of their ears- in exchange for resources. As such traits are inherited genetically, the player will selectively encourage the breeding of its bunnies !
game.history: Lenophie participated in a game-jam organized by Abiding Bridge mid-2019. There, they met Pakrett, a graphic designer, the kind of talent Lenophie had been looking for to bring their vision to life ! Bunny enthusiasts as they are, they both settled for developing a bunny-related game in a minimal amount of time, so they could tell if they liked working together. The scope of the game grew and... voilà, the team expanded with the arrival of a musician, a narrative designer and another graphic designer while the game is now announced to be released on Steam !

features.feature: Bond with the cutest virtual bunnies you've ever seen, they come in all shapes and sizes but require the same amount of petting !
Send some bunnies for adoption so you can, in return, keep pampering to your favorite bun. :3
Traits are inherited genetically, breed responsibly !
Everything is as flashy and sweet as it can get, from lovely graphics to sugary musics !
